channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 05:11 Fragrant anxiety in the Uman District.Creck on Further Messages.
item.description: 🟢 05:11 Fragrant anxiety in the Uman District.Creck on Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 02:50 PM Anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region.
